subheader: Encrypted Chat. No History. No Logs.

socket.error: An error occurred in the socket connection!
socket.close: The socket connection has been dropped!

status.timeout: There is a networking issue. waiting...

send.notConnected: Cannot send messages without a connection!

subscribe.notConnected: Cannot subscribe to a channel without a socket connection!

faq.title: F.A.Q
faq.whatIsA:
EmberClear is the open source p2p encrypted chat
        client that operates over open source
        mesh nodes on free-tier cloud services.
faq.howDoesWorkA:
All the encryption is done in the browser -- at no time do private keys leave your computer.
        EmberClear uses libsodium's public key-cryptography to ensure cryptographically safe messaging
        across the internet, on any network -- even if the network is compromised.
faq.whyA:
Partially for fun and learning -- wanting to provide a framework for people wanting to
        get in to web applications so that they pre-existing tools that can interface with their
        creations.

        This project is also inspired by a lack of trust in existing chat apps and their infrastructure.
        Ultimately, this project, by functionality, will be a clone of whatever is popular - with the
        one key difference that nothing is ever tracked by the relays / federated nodes.

footer.license: The source code uses the GPL-3 license.

login.title: Login
login.instructions: Please paste or type your mnemonic key.

setup.warning:
Warning: You are about to destroy an existing identity.
        Please be sure you have backed up the mnemonic and / or
        settings
setup.overwriteTitle: Are you sure you want to create a new identity?
setup.overwriteQuestion:
This is a destructive action, that will cause the currently configured identity to be forgotten and replaced. There is no way to recover, and without having the mnemonic saved somewhere, you will be unable to connect with any of the previously configured chats as no one will know who you are.

Are you sure you want to do this?
setup.overwriteAbort: No, take me back to safety
setup.introQuestion: What would you like to be called?
setup.almostReady: You are almost ready to begin chatting!
setup.nameLabel: This is how others will identify you
setup.mnemonicPrompt:
If you would like to use this account on other computers,
        please store this mnemonic in a secure place. It will be used
        to login.
setup.note:
You may download your settings at any time so that you can upload
        them to another computer. The settings will include more than just
        your identity.
